attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: i would give this app less stars if i could. this app made my phone crash SO MANY times. i think it’s because my phone also doesn’t like what the app stands for so it was telling me to stop at all costs. terrible app should be taken down.

attributes.title: Basura 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app is basura. Needless to say it should be removed. This man known as the “Cheeto man” should be removed from his presidential throne as he wishes to remove our 1st amendment. Freedom of speech. This dude has dementia and is a rapist. The app is trash bro, like this Cheeto really out here thinking he can rule a whole country and upload hourly the thoughts that come to mind. Like BOY BYE ✌🏻

attributes.title: Disgusting and Offensive
attributes.review: When😔 I 🤪downloaded 🤩this 😳app👌 I 🧑‍🦯thought👯‍♂️ it 🤷‍♀️would 😒be 😞a ☹️good 😝one 😤but 😠man 😱I 🤭was 🤨totally 🥺wrong 😭 It 😣has 😫very 😶offensive 🤬things😑 and 😴a 😵unappetizing 🤢Cheeto 🤮with 👹blonde 👿hair 😬like 🙄who 😐is 👻that😮anyways 💩I 😾wouldn’t💀 recommend 👽this 🤖app 🤡it 👺needs🥵 to 🤔be 😓taken 🥰down😍...and that’s on peridot.💅✌️✨

attributes.title: I WENT BLIND FOR A DAY!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my eyes were blinded by a hot Cheeto with oily hair! Unbelievable 😡i cannot believe that I was scarred with that picture for a WHOLE DAY it’s traumatic and it made my phone glitch unbelievably and then as soon as I downloaded it my flamingo ran away and destroyed all the neighbors TRUMP 2020 flag! He got a treat for it :)

attributes.title: How could our president do this
attributes.review: This app is slow and awful with updates. Never shows any valued or important information what’s so ever. I recommend that this app be removed from the App Store immediately due to it’s invalid content and useless information. REMOVE THIS APP NOW!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE😡
attributes.review: This app was traumatizing😳. I downloaded it to keep up with politics, but I open up the app to Trump, a wrinkled old PEDO man with an orange🍊 cheeto spray tan!!😨😨 I quickly tried to scroll away but the app GLITCHED😖. I wanted to vomit right then and there but my cat saw the awful man and threw up on my shoulder🤢🤮. Thanks to this app, my cat now has PTSD🤧😿. I DO NOT recommend 😤😡.

attributes.title: No 💖
attributes.review: This app is just a plain big NO💖. It’s glitchy and the starting photo of the Cheeto just scares me. Even my little sister is traumatized. Horrific.I don’t suggest getting this app or any Cheeto apps.I mean,who wants a Cheeto as president👁👄👁? It’s upsetting to see how this app works for some people but it’s just plain out garbage for me! 😔

attributes.title: disgusting😔
attributes.review: i decided to download the app for cheeto/ bunker boy but as i opened it i was shocked to see a nude witch in mcdonald’s casting a spell on me! she said it was under trumps orders to curse people who downloaded this app✨💀 she proceeded to tell me that i would be cursed for the rest of my life while telling me i was worthless and calling me terrible things🤧 not to mention she was extremely racist and homophobic. my phone then proceeded to burst into flames leaving me to write this review on a touch screen toaster. this is not a good app and now i am haunted, thanks bunker boy😡

attributes.title: by far the worst app i have ever downloaded
attributes.review: this is absolutely TERRIBLE. i opened the app and it glitched around 40 times, then when it finally decided to work, it threatened to find me and kill me if i didn’t send them all of my personal information. are u kidding me? who MADE THIS!!!??

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: This app is such I horrible app I open it and there was a naked Cheeto lookin man it’s so bad and it also hacked into my phone and was opening social media accounts acting like me and using all my pictures don’t download apple needs to take it down from the App Store
